title: Integrate AWS Lambda with Amazon Elastic Container Service
description: Terraform IaC template to provision Amazon Elastic Container Registry (ECR) resources to integrate with AWS Lambda.

introBox.headline: How it works
text: This pattern will provision Amazon Elastic Container Registry (ECR), create a container along with AWS Lambda to call a container from AWS Lambda.
This create container has example bash script to demonstrate on how to modernize existing bash code via minimum code change.
See the README in the GitHub repo for detailed testing instructions.
